name: narwhal/md4
doc:
A JavaScript implementation of the RSA Data Security, Inc. MD4 Message
Digest Algorithm, as defined in RFC 1320.

children.name: hash

returns.doc: a hexadecimal string of the MD4 hash for a given string, as interpreted in bytes.

children.doc: Returns a hexadecimal string of the MD4 hash for a given string, as interpreted in bytes.

hash.name: hash

returns.doc: a hexadecimal string of the MD4 hash for a given string, as interpreted in bytes.
